AfterMartialArtsInstructorFendsOffThief,.name: After martial arts instructor fends off thief, police warn of fighting back
AfterMartialArtsInstructorFendsOffThief,.summary: Law enforcement experts weigh in on attempted robbery video.

ArmedRobberStoppedByMartialArtsInstructo.name: Armed Robber Stopped By Martial Arts Instructor
ArmedRobberStoppedByMartialArtsInstructo.summary: The video reports on an attempted robbery at the Winwin Kung Fu Studio in Squirrel Hill on Halloween night. A man with a gun entered the studio after a class had just finished. The kung fu instructor, Joshua Wong, demonstrated how he quickly took down the assailant. While Wong held the gunman, a student attempted to disarm him. However, the suspect was very strong and managed to escape. Thankfully, no one was hurt. The suspect is still at large, and police are investigating. Other local businesses are now increasing their vigilance during closing hours.

KenyansUseKungFuToFightCrime,Addiction.name: Kenyans use Kung Fu to fight crime, addiction
KenyansUseKungFuToFightCrime,Addiction.summary: In Kiambu, Kenya, Kung Fu enthusiasts are teaching martial arts to youth to foster discipline and combat crime and addiction.
